dsOverview.title: TDL U.S. and Canada Surface Hourly Observations

summary.p: Hourly airways data over US, Canada for about 2,000 stations. There are also some observations for Mexico and most Central American countries.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/NWS/OST/MDL > Meteorological Development Laboratory, Office of Science and Technology, National Weather Service, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
